name: Ships Of Glory
description:
Ships of Glory is a mobile free-to-play naval action simulator.
Command your battleship as a third person shooter and plan your battlefield war strategy.

Take command of a variety of ships from the World War 1 and World War 2 era including Patrol Boats, Destroyers, Cruisers, Battleships, Dreadnoughts and Submarines.

The only rules of this game is that there are no rules! Battle with friends or go it alone. The choice is yours.

Run escort for your allies cargo or passenger missions and be rewarded should they deem you worthy!

Sneak up on your opponents in one of 3 submarine types before unloading your torpedo's!

Lay a minefield with the mine laying cruiser!

Use depth charges or hedgehogs on enemy subs!

Strategically get in position and fire deadly broadside attacks!

Lead enemies into the firepower of your allied forces!

You can even fly the pirate flag to put the fear of the seas into your opponents!

Train up on the low tier training server before taking on massive action in the main battle server.

Good Luck Captain!
